Text: TRAVELSHORTSTRAVELSHORTSCOM OTC BB TLSH Latest price cents This could be a company well worth keeping an eye on There is not much information available yet but we expect to see some exciting announcements in the very near future TRAVELSHORTSCOM INC TAKES ANOTHER STEP TOWARDS ITS QUEST TO ACQUIRE OIL GAS ASSETS VANCOUVER British ColumbiaNov Travelshortscom Inc the Company OTCBB TLSH announced today that it has enlisted the services of Edison Oil and Gas Ltd to evaluate a number of oil and gas exploration and development properties in the USA The management of Edison Oil and Gas Ltd has over years of oil and gas exploration and development experience in the states of Texas California Oklahoma Wyoming Kansas Colorado and Montana On Behalf of Travelshortscom Inc signed Robert Sawatsky President This press release contains forwardlooking statements regarding Travelshortscom Inc and its future sales related activities Actual results could differ materially from those announced today that it has started to investigate various oil and gas resources business opportunities primarily in the Western United States As part of its investigation the Company is presently reviewing and considering the independent analysis and evaluation of various oil and gas properties The Company will continue this investigative effort as appropriate properties are submitted for PC EPHONEPC EPHONE OTC BB PCPH Latest price cents Check out this awesome device at Comparing the common shares of PC EPHONE outstanding as of October with the market capitalization of a company such as PALM this is a stock that really could be about to fly With news of carrier approval expected soon there could be a huge win here PCPH was over earlier this year and that was well before all the recent exciting events PCEPHONE HONORED AT COMDEX FALL SAN DIEGONov PCEPhone Inc OTCBB PCPH Frankfurt NL WKN is pleased to announce that it has been honored at Comdex Fall in Las Vegas by industry experts On the first day of Comdex the PCEPhone device won the Positive Image News Reviews Editors Choice Award The article referred to the PCEPhone device as light years ahead of the rest and stated that PC EPhone has bestowed upon us a historical moment to view a product of such magnitude in design and innovation The full article can be accessed at comdexpcephoneindexhtml In addition for an unprecedented second year the PCEPhone device was selected a finalist for Best of Comdex This year the PCEPhone device was nominated in the MobileHandheld System category along with products from Toshiba and Handspring Last year the device was the finalist in the Best of Comdex WirelessMobile Product category We are pleased and honored to have been selected and nominated by leading industry experts for such recognition said David Meltzer CEO and President of PC EPhone Inc We are proud of our development partner Cyberbank Corp and their dedication to making such fine worldclass wireless devices About PCEPhone Inc PCEPhone Inc through its wholly owned subsidiary is the exclusive US and Canadian distributor of the PC EPhone device and the Company also has the right to co develop Cyberbank Corps the developer of the PCEPhone and a major shareholder of the Company future devices The PCEPhone is the worlds first wireless convergent device which combines the capabilities of a handheld personal computer with full Internet access a cellular phone a PDA and an organizer allinone This news release contains forwardlooking statements which are made pursuant to the safe harbor provisions of the United States Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of All statements other than statements of historical fact are statements that could be deemed forwardlooking statements
